attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current legislation does not protect christians from working sundays, we wish this to be changed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Protect Christians From Working Sundays."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22215


Prime Minister's Office
